title: Sustainable Dissolution of Collagen and Formation of Polypeptides in Deep Eutectic Solvents for Use as Antibacterial Agents
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00122B, Paper

Harmandeep Kaur, Manpreet Singh, Navdeep Kaur, Pratap Kumar Pati, Monika Rani, Tejwant Singh Kang
Collagen is a hard-to-dissolve protein in water and many other solvents, which limits its applications. Herein, Deep Eutectic Solvents (DESs) i.e. choline chloride: lactic acid (ChCl:LA = 1:1) and ethylene...
